ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This research was funded under the ‘Research & Technology Development Innovation Projects’ AgroETAK and MIS 453350 in the framework of the Operational Program ‘Human Resources Development’. It is co-funded by the European Social Fund through the National Strategic Reference Framework (Research Funding Program 2007–2013) and coordinated by the Hellenic Agricultural Organization DEMETER. Grant holder: Adriana Skendi.
